duties_responsibilities.duty: Engage customers in conversation to understand their banking needs and preferences
Provide assistance with account servicing needs
Facilitate customer awareness and education of bank services, including digital banking capabilities
Introduce customers to other branch team members or bank partners who are able to provide solutions for their financial needs

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED and 6 months customer service experience, Preferred Area of Experience: Sales, Skill(s): Financial literacy, Knowledge of retail banking products and services
